summary: This document is the Operating Agreement for Neptune, LLC, executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein as the sole member. It outlines the formation, management, and operational guidelines for the company, including the appointment of Richard Kahn as the manager and details regarding capital contributions and dissolution procedures.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the sole member of Neptune, LLC, contributing capital and having authority over the company's operations.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is appointed as the manager of Neptune, LLC, responsible for managing the company's business and affairs.

connections.description: Jeffrey E. Epstein, as the sole member, appoints Richard Kahn to manage the company.

events.title: Execution of Operating Agreement
events.description: The Operating Agreement for Neptune, LLC is executed by Jeffrey E. Epstein, establishing the company's structure and management.

keyFacts: Jeffrey E. Epstein is the sole member of Neptune, LLC and has made a capital contribution of $1,000.
Richard Kahn is appointed as the manager of Neptune, LLC, with specific powers and responsibilities outlined in the agreement.
The company is organized as a Delaware limited liability company and is subject to the Delaware Limited Liability Company Act.
The agreement specifies conditions under which the company may incur debt and the authority required for various actions.
The company can be dissolved by the consent of the sole member or through judicial decree.
